title: No key fragments?
body:
Ever since the new client, I haven't been getting any key fragments.
I am aware that these key fragments are somewhat random, but I have played more than 20 games and haven't gotten a single key.
If this has been happening to anyone else I would like to know that it isn't just me.

replies.body:
The key fragment drop rate is not static, but rather each key drop lowers the drop rate for the next one. This resets every month (from when you earned your first key), so what happens to people that play a lot is that towards the end of their month they will be earning very few keys. 

When your month resets you'll likely know very quickly, because you'll be earning a lot of keys all of a sudden :)
